author: Tal Axelrod
title: China holds day of mourning for coronavirus victims
description: China observed a national day of mourning on Saturday for victims of the coronavirus, which first started in the country and has now spread across the globe.Sirens were heard ringing across the country and the nati...
content:
China observed a national day of mourning on Saturday for victims of the coronavirus, which first started in the country and has now spread across the globe.
Sirens were heard ringing across the country and the national flag was flown at half-mast as the pub… [+1107 chars]
